programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A wife and mother is handcuffed and taken into an unmarked car by a blond woman on a Monday morning, but her family is unable to find any record of the arrest.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man uses a dating site to meet and murder a college student.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Two tenacious sisters determined to fulfill a promise investigate the mystery surrounding their mother's death.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After a young mom is found dead on the side of a country road, 40 miles from her Knoxville home, investigators scramble to figure out how she ended up there.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The friends of a a Georgia father accused of murdering his ex-wife come together to prove he is innocent, while prosecutors count on his young children to testify against him.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A tight-knit Long Island family go to extraordinary lengths to find their missing sister.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Years after a Montana man is found dead, his son opens up a box of case files to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Months after a woman and her husband come down with the same mysterious illness, the woman dies after experiencing the same symptoms; old recordings reveal the twisted truth about her demise.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A detective comes face to face with a serial killer when she promises to get justice for the mother of a victim whose body turns up at an Anaheim trash facility.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a soldier vanishes from Fort Hood, her family do everything they can to bring attention to her disappearance; Secretary of the Army Ryan McCarthy speaks about the investigation and allegations of sexual assault in the military.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman comes forward with the truth about the deaths of three other women, solving a 17-year-old mystery; interviews with two people at the center of the case.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The disappearance of 19-year-old Alaska Native Sonya Ivanoff sends shockwaves through the small coastal city of Nome, Alaska; police scramble to find answers until a note is found in a stolen police vehicle telling the cops to back off or else.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When hikers find a 21-year-old UCLA student's body in a Los Angeles-area train tunnel, detectives wonder if Ron's interest in an alternative religion is connected to his murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Two Tulsa brothers fight for more than 20 years to prove their innocence after they were wrongfully convicted for separate murders.
